metadata.title: Effects of Luteolin on the Proliferation of Rat Lung Fibroblasts

abstract.original_text: AIM: To approach the effects of luteolin on proliferation of rat lung fibroblasts. METHODS: The lung fibroblasts were isolated from the lungs of Sprague-Dawley rats at postnatal day 3, and were then passaged to 96-well culture plates. All cells were divide into 6 groups including normal control group, positive control group, 4×10 -, × -, × -
